pages.title: Zomboss Doll
pages.text: Its recipe is related to Gargantuar's drop item.

The current version only has a weak BOSS($(bred)Noble Zombie$()), which will be generated when a $(l)multi-block structure$() is built. You need $(l) three obsidians connected straight together, and then place two withered roses $() on each side, as shown in the picture on the right.
